GoldenEye:;
She screamed as the arrow hit her leg. She lowered her eagle head and 
pulled it out. She then fired her optic lazars at Starlight.


::KitKat::
She jumped to the side, barely missing the shot from Astral.
She loaded up her plasma rifle and returned fire.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dark Lavacons/Dollen::
> 
>       The Dark Lavacons saw the preds ahead, and prepared for 
attack.
> 
>       "Ok, troops, ATTACK!!!  SHOW THE PREDACONS NO MERCY!" Astral 
commanded.
> 
>       Fenox began firing dark heat optic blasts at DrillBit.
> 
>       Recklessa landed, and fired her gatling guns madly at 
GoldenEye.
> 
>      "You show 'em your stuff Recklessa!!" yelled Starlight, who 
fired a shot from her darkflame crossbow at GoldenEye.
> 
>      Griplash stayed in the air, looking for the perfect target to 
slice open with his dark lava blade.
> 
>       Astral, still in the air, grabbed his darkflame rocket 
launcher, and fired one big blast down at KitKat.
> 
>       "Let's show them the power of the Allience!" Astral yelled 
with pride.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>  (Ok, I forget where I last was with Dollen, so just go along with 
me, ok?)
> 
>       Dollen saw bad things happening.  People were dieing.  
Cybertronians.  He was on Cybertron.  Something was destroying 
everything.  He ran across the Cybertronian street, looking for 
somewhere to hide, when he froze.  
> 
>      A fem-bot was there in front of him.  This was the fem-bot he 
always had visions of!  
> 
>      "Who are you??" cried Dollen, feeling fear.
> 
>      "Your destiny," the bot said.
> 
>      "My what?" Dollen said, confused.
> 
>      Suddenly, she exploded, and then, everything started to 
explode.  He felt pain, then he exploded!  His spark was floating in 
nothing, and then it dissolved.
> 
>      "AAAHHH!!!!!" Dollen screamed, suddenly awakening from a bad 
dream.
> 
>      He calmed down, then looked around.
> 
>      "Silent.....Where is everybody?" He said to himself.  
> 
>       Dollen realized they must be in battle.
> 
>      Suddenly, Dollen had a vision.  It showed KitKat and the 
others fighting the Alliance, and getting the crap beat out of them.
> 
>      "No!  Not if I can help it!" Dollen yelled, and ran out of the 
base.
> 
>       Dollen ran, and ran, until he arrived at the scene of the 
battle.
> 
>       He jumped out in the center of the battlefield.
> 
>       "The Predacons will win!!!!!!!!!!!!" Dollen screamed.
> 
>       He grabbed his ray gun, and fired madly around, all over the 
Alliance force, inaccurately, but loads o' shots.
